EmailTemplate.subject: Still Interested in ProSeries Tax?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Last tax season you contacted us because you were having second thoughts about your professional tax software. Are you still in the market for a new, more reliable solution? Now would be a great time to choose ProSeries® so you can start realizing the benefits as you finish tax year 2012 extensions, and as you prepare for the upcoming 2013 tax season.
As a reminder, here are some of the reasons tax professionals like you choose ProSeries:
- File returns faster – with less hassle and more confidence. 20+ built-in time saving features like Missing Client Data Tool, ProSeries Tax Import, and Modernized E-File Support can save you valuable hours every tax season. - Backed by Intuit and used by more practices than any other. With more than 65,000 practices, ProSeries is the leading professional tax software on the market today. We have more satisfied customers than Drake, ATX, or TaxWorks. - New pricing options. You asked for more competitive pricing, and we responded. Now we have unlimited individual and business bundles, and pay-as-you-go options that give you the flexibility to pay for only the returns you need. Plus, I can offer you special multi-year pricing to make your transition even more worthwhile.
Our toll-free U.S.-based support is available right now to help you get up to speed, and throughout the tax season to ensure you’re getting the most out of ProSeries during your busiest times. (In the final week of tax season 2012, our average wait time was only about 2 minutes!)
If you haven’t found that ideal tax software solution, let’s talk. Drop me a line or give me a ring, and I’ll be happy to tell you more about what ProSeries can do for you and your practice.
{!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
